title: Grab a Club: PGA Tour 2K25 Legend & Deluxe Editions Now Available for Xbox Series X|S
description: The post Grab a Club: PGA Tour 2K25 Legend & Deluxe Editions Now Available for Xbox Series X|S appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: Mike Nelson, Xbox Wire Editor
excerpt: Pre-order PGA TOUR 2K25 Legend Edition to get up to 7 days of Early Access and PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Edition! Upgrade your play—and your look—with a staggering SIX extra content packs full of powerful upgrades, chic cosmetics, and a new playable character.
text: Pre-order PGA TOUR 2K25 Legend Edition for up to 7 days of Early Access (from Feb 21, 2025) + PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Edition!* Get the Legend Edition to upgrade your play—and your look—with a staggering SIX extra content packs full of powerful upgrades, chic cosmetics, and a new playable character. Legend Edition includes: •PGA TOUR 2K25 •SUN DAY RED Pack: Red Polo, Black Hat, Black Pants and White Glove + Tiger’s TaylorMade Driver Qi10 LS •Malbon Bucket Ball Pack: 3 unique Malbon Balls •Member’s Pass: Clubhouse Pass Premium (Seasons 1-5), Clubhouse Gear Pack—one outfit per body type per season; Season 1 items available at launch •Birdie Pack: Titleist GT4 Driver, Titleist Pro V1 Ball, FootJoy Premiere Series - Field Shoes, Umbrella Hat •Starter Pack: 1 Evo Tool, 5 Level-Up Tokens, 5 Club Fittings, 3 Ball Fittings + 1800 VC •Extra Butter x adidas Pack: Playable Chris McDonald + Extra Butter x adidas cosmetic hat, jacket, and shoes REAL FEEL Swing your swing with new EvoSwing mechanics. MAJOR TOURNAMENTS HAVE ARRIVED U.S. Open Championship, The Open Championship, and PGA Championship make their 2K debut. MyCAREER AND MyPLAYER, YOUR WAY Be your authentic self in the most immersive MyCAREER and diverse MyPLAYER experiences ever. SEASONS—BACK AND BETTER THAN EVER Non-expiring Clubhouse Pass, power increases for progression, Ranked resets, content updates + more. GRAB A CLUB, GRAB A FRIEND Deep multiplayer matches include Stroke Play, Match Play, Scramble, and tournaments. Challenge friends cross-platform. UNLEASH YOUR INNER COURSE ARCHITECT Craft your dream course with new objects, cameras, tools + more in Course Designer. *Pre-order PGA TOUR 2K25 through 27 February 2025 and receive a digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Edition for the same platform. Digital copy of PGA TOUR 2K23 will be automatically entitled and available to download within 24 hours following pre-order. PGA TOUR 2K23 must be downloaded to the platform account used to pre-order PGA TOUR 2K25 and is non-transferable. Offer not available to platform accounts that already own PGA TOUR 2K23 on the same platform. Canceled pre-orders will result in removal of PGA TOUR 2K23 digital copy from platform account. Terms apply. Certain features of the game, including the in-game store, may not be accessible by child accounts. A child means players under the age of 13, unless local laws specify differently.
